snippet.title: Reign of Guilds - Prototype gameplay video
snippet.description:
Site: https://reignofguilds.com/ 
Forum:https://reignofguilds.com/forum/index... 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/reignofguilds
Twitter: https://twitter.com/reignofguilds

Development stage: Early Alpha
Genre: First person MMORPG 
Setting: Magic medieval
Engine: Unreal Engine 4

As you might know we've closed free access to ROG's prototype and decided to make short video of development stage - what was made, how the game has been changed since the first updates.

The video depicts PvP battles that took place in December 2017 (after the update #5 that included system, that allows easily implement magic, abilities and buffs. In update #5 this system already included fire magic) and in February 2018 (after the update #6). Update #6 added to the ROG professional skills and buffs, which made battles even more dynamic and exciting.

Big thanks to our community member Sen0rLuck for his help with this video.
